Package org.ambraproject.rhino.rest.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArticleCrudController
    Controller for _c_reate, _r_ead, _u_pdate, and _d_elete operations on article entities and files.
    ArticleStateController
    Controller class used for reading and writing an article's state after its creation.
    AssetController  
    AssetFileCrudController  
    ConfigurationReadController  
    ContentRepoController  
    IngestibleController
    Controller enabling access to the ambra ingest directory (whose location is defined by the ambra.services.documentManagement.ingestSourceDir property of ambra.xml).
    IngestibleZipController  
    IssueCrudController  
    JournalCrudController  
    PingbackReadController  
    RootController  
    TaxonomyController
    Controller class for the taxonomy namespace.
    TestCrossrefController
    Controller class intended to simulate the response from Crossref upon article syndication; useful for manual testing.
    UserCrudController
    Controller for users
    VolumeCrudController
